~IAkSinkPluginContext
virtual AkUInt16 AK::IAkPluginContextBase::GetMaxBufferLength (  )  const [pure virtual, inherited]

Retrieve the maximum number of frames that Execute() will be called with for this effect. Can be used by the effect to make memory allocation at initialization based on this worst case scenario.

Returns:
Maximum number of frames.
